column1: Data compilation from experiments on N solubility in silicate melts, Fe-metal, and aqueous fluids.
fO2 are calculated using the constants A, B, and C after Frost, 1991.
Melt = silicate melt, MeltM = silicate melt in equilibrium with Fe-metal, Metal = Fe-metal, Fluid = aqueous fluid, Dmetal = Metal/MeltM, Dfluid = Fluid/Melt
Distribution coefficients are shown for experiments with coexisting Metal/Melt (Dmetal) and Fluid/Melt (Dfluid)
Buffers are: MH = magnetite-hematite, IW = iron-wustite, MM = MnO4-MnO , NNO = nickel-nickel oxide, MW = magnetite-wustite , CoCO = cobalt-cobalt oxide
